ygData.subject: Re: Questions and Tips
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think it comes from a named orc, spawns in the same place as the one carrying the shiny brass items. ... This is in South Karana. The rare spawn is a
ygData.messageBody:
--- David Sues <riptide@...> wrote:
> From: David Sues <riptide@...>
------ snip ------
> Ok, that about ends my knowledge...know, i have a
> request for a few
> spoilers of my own
> Most of these deal with packs or bags which reduce
> the weight of things
> put inside...
> For all of these, I would love to have information
> on:
> % of weight reduction
> where it is found
> what level to get it
> how much do they sell for
>
> Shralok Pack- I know it comes from Highhold Pass,
> thats it

I think it comes from a named orc, spawns in the same
place as the one carrying the shiny brass items.

>
> Bag of Sewn Evil Eye- Found in Lower Guk?, 8 slots
>
> Traveler's Backpack- found on Rathyl in Najena, need
> to get keys or
> something to find him
>
> Traveler's Pouch- found on Rathyl in Najena, can
> only hold small items
>
> Traveler's Pack- reduces weight by 20%, 8 slots,
> sometimes reward for
> Nillipus quest
>
> Archaelogist's Pack- found on Goblin Archaelogist in
> Permafrost, 6 slots
>
> Lionhide Backpack- found in South Karana? off of a
> rare spawn

This is in South Karana. The rare spawn is a named
Troll. (SK I think, had a green pet). I would say the
mob is level 25 or more, conned red to me at level 21.

>
> Pierce's Pouch of Storing- reduces weight of items
> by 50-75%, 8 slots,
> sometimes a reward from Nillipus
> quest
>
> If you know of anymore weight reduces packs, and
> have information on
> where to get them, please let me
> know...Any information about these items would be
> appreciated.
>
> Also, where is the best place to find black pearls
> if I wanted to buy
> them?
> And info on the Serpent Skin Eyepatch would be
> appreciated...
>
> Sorry so long,
> All help is appreciated,
>
> Grimlin
> Level 16 Monk
> Bristlebane server
